cause.description:
It is time for the youth of our nation to unite and take control of the future of this great country. no more old time politics, old timers are no longer interested in what is best for the future development of OUR! great land, instead more interested in riding out there pensions in comfort, therefor it is time for the youth to step in and start deciding how this country is going to be run in the near future. now is the time to come together and overthrow these old timers and who better to lead you than yours truely.
1. the young people of canada need a voice in parliment
2. young people should be voting.. for me.
3. the youth can make this country better than our predecessors
cause.name: Andrew Clark for Prime Minister
